Name: EffectObjGravityDust
Notes: A special particles effect object whose rotation is affected by the gravity it is placed in.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will emit particles only if this switch is activated.

Group.Description: Groups objects of the same kind, but the group is never used for anything.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: If used, it will start functioning once its cutscene action gets triggered. In SMG2, it will stop functioning if Obj_arg0 is set.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: Continues movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.
